page.title: 06LOCAL EMPLOYERS
page.content: Mr Thompson has had a contracting firm for 30 years. He employs four men, one of whom lives locally. Occasionally he does work for the Council_repairing roads or snow clearing when necessary. For 25 years Mr Atkinson has owned a small building business which he and his son work together. Most of his work consists of repair work and is carried out within a radius of 10 miles. Mr Tweed started up an Agriculturing Engineering Firm 30 years ago. He is now in partnership with his son and another local man.They repair machinery,mostly in the workshop but sometimes on site. Mr Rooke recently moved into the area and has taken over the local milk round. He has 2 boys who help him in the mornings.
